[Density](./density.nb.html): $f(x) = \frac{1}{\sqrt{2 \pi} o} exp(- \frac{(x - \mu)^2}{2o^2})$

specifically for $\mu = 0$ and $o^2 = 1$, the density $\phi$ is: $\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi}} exp(-0.5x^2)$

[Distribution Function](./distributionFunction.nb.html):
$F(x) = \frac{1}{\sqrt{2 \pi ^2}}exp(-\frac{(x-\mu^2)}{2o^2})$
